title: One Veg World
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, International, Take-out, Asian, Fusion
description: Opened May 2015, this is the second One Veg World restaurant; its first is in West Covina. Offers a large menu with various cuisines ranging from breakfast and American classics like pizza and sandwiches to Asian delights like vegetable sushi rolls and fried spring rolls to Mexican tacos. Has vegan cupcakes and cookies as well. Please check its facebook for all-you-can-eat buffet evening dates.
